title: geth-1.10.25 after "The merge" event my syncmode light can't find peers.
body:
updated to the latest version: geth-linux-amd64-1.10.25-69568c55
and start geth like this:
`/usr/bin/geth --datadir "/opt/ethereum" --mainnet --ws --http --http.api="eth,web3,net,personal,miner" --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 8502 --authrpc.vhosts 0.0.0.0 --syncmode light --authrpc.jwtsecret=/opt/jwtsecret`

then shows as follows:

```
INFO [09-22|09:42:07.766] Gasprice oracle is ignoring threshold set threshold=2
WARN [09-22|09:42:07.766] Unclean shutdown detected                booted=2022-09-22T03:48:03+0000 age=5h54m4s
```

I tried the way like in this link: https://nimbus.guide/el-light-client.html. But still not working, please give me a hand. Thanks very much.
